bug.author: TobyRoseman
bug.summary: API Documentation Not Rendering Math Equations
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêûDescribe the bug</denchmark-h>
Math equations are not getting rendered on the hosted API docs for coremltools. For example the entry for <denchmark-link:https://apple.github.io/coremltools/coremlspecification/sections/NeuralNetwork.html#batchnormlayerparams>BatchnormLayerParams</denchmark-link> shows: <denchmark-code>y_i = \gamma_i \dfrac{ (x_i - \mu_i)}{\sqrt{\sigma_i^2 + \epsilon}} + \beta_i \;,\;i=1,....,C </denchmark-code>
There are many other examples of this problem on the same webpage. <denchmark-h:h2>System environment</denchmark-h>
Safari - Version 13.0.3 (14608.3.10.1.2) macOS 10.14.16
